projectInfo: A Reddit/Dev.to inspired MERN forum for developers to share ideas, ask questions, and collaborate. Features include posts, comments, voting, reports, membership, admin dashboard, and JWT-secured authentication.

An e-learning platform where users can browse courses, enroll, and view details. Admins can manage course listings and students. Implements seat limit, dynamic dashboards, and Firebase-based secure login.

AluWish is a MERN-based wishlist and gift-tracking application that allows users to create, share, and manage their wishlist items. It supports user authentication, image uploads, category filters, and responsive UI for seamless use across devices.
A simple MERN CRUD app to track and manage plant care routines. Users can add, edit, delete, and view plant details with theme support and responsive design.
